headline: Alliant Energy releases new Corporate Responsibility Report
summary: MADISON, Wis., July 23, 2025--Alliant Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: LNT) published its latest Corporate Responsibility Report (CRR) today. The report includes updates on the company’s sustainability data for 2024. The report also highlights the company’s balanced mix of energy sources, employee engagement opportunities and positive impact on the communities it serves.
